title: The developer shall not create any third party interest by any means except for free sale component or D
clause_text: The developer shall not create any third party interest by any means except for free sale component or D.R.C. of the scheme. Any such act of the developer shall be liable for administrative action against him including criminal action under relevant law or Cr. PC for the misuse of public property.
section: PAYMENTS TO BE MADE TO SRA AND INSTALMENTS :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
